game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world where magic has disappeared, humans are on the brink of extinction. The land is scorched, and resources are scarce.
game.ending: After gathering allies and uncovering the secrets of the ancient world, the protagonist defeats the dark sorcerer in an epic battle, restoring magic to the world and bringing hope back to humanity.
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has been lost for centuries, a young protagonist discovers they have the ability to wield it. As they embark on a journey to uncover the secrets of their past and the reason behind the loss of magic, they must confront dark forces seeking to exploit the power vacuum. Along the way, they gather allies from different factions vying for control in this new world.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
